meanings.definition: The state or quality of being husky.
meanings.sent1: Her huskinesses made her voice stand out in the choir.
meanings.sent2: The huskinesses of the old barn added to its rustic charm.
meanings.sent3: The huskinesses of the puppy's bark sounded surprisingly mature.
meanings.sent4: The huskinesses of the wind through the trees created a haunting melody.
meanings.sent5: The huskinesses of the actor's voice added depth to his performance.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a deep, rough voice.
meanings.sent1: His huskinesses gave his singing a unique edge.
meanings.sent2: The huskinesses in his voice made him sound like a seasoned storyteller.
meanings.sent3: The huskinesses in her voice made her sound like she had been up all night.
meanings.sent4: The huskinesses in the air seemed to echo the rugged landscape.
meanings.sent5: The huskinesses in his voice added a touch of mystery to his words.
